text: Sani Dangote (1959/60 â€“ 14 November 2021) was a Nigerian businessman and brother to Aliko Dangote. He died on 14 November 2021 in the United States from colon cancer. == Biography == Dangote had one wife and eight children. The only remaining brother to him is Aliko Dangote. == References == Category:20th-century births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:People from Kano State
title: Sani Dangote
